features: [Multiple gameplay] AIQI gesture sensing remote control stunt car is equipped with a remote control and a sensing watch. Control the car with a watch or a remote control, and the stunt car will move forward/backward/rotate/spray/automatically demonstrate. Pairing with color changing lighting is more fun for both boys and girls, whether it's day or night, indoors or outdoors.

[All Directional Drift Cool Stunt] High-tech remote control stunt car can rotate 360 ° and double sided driving, drive on both sides, spray and automatically demonstrate. The cool lighting and unlimited functions provide children with a wonderful operating experience and visual effects.

[Using Multiple Terrain Off-Road Tires] 4WD remote control car is equipped with unique roller anti-collision tires, suitable for indoor and outdoor adventures such as stairs, carpets, beaches, grasslands, etc. Flexible wheels ensure higher speed and better flexibility.

[Safe and Durable Rechargeable Battery] Remote control car is equipped with a USB charging cable and a rechargeable upgraded 3.7V (1300mAh) battery, which can charge the sensing watch and remote control car at any time. Charging for two hours can bring hours of fun.

[Exquisite and Cool Gift] Stunt gesture car with light, drift through, remote control, dance, spray, etc., meets all the fantasies of boys and girls about toy cars, and is very suitable for New Year, birthday, holiday, Children's Day and Christmas.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Play with friends, parents, siblings and classmates in action-packed games to have fun for hours
360° rotating, auto-mode. How cool every second you feel, when this stunt car accompany you!
Sturdy and durable. The remote control car can conquer kinds of obstacles, such as rocks, branches and rolling roads.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This little RC car is packed with some cool features that make it incredibly entertaining. First off, it comes with built-in LED lights that not only add to its aesthetics but also make it look even cooler, especially in the dark. But what sets this RC car apart is its unique control system. Instead of using a traditional remote control, you wear a control module on your hand. To make the car move forward or backward, you simply tilt your hand up or down. Turning left or right is as easy as rotating your hand in the desired direction.This gesture-based control is not only intuitive but also incredibly fun to use. It's perfect for kids who are learning hand-eye coordination as they play. The car responds promptly to your movements, making it feel like an extension of your hand.But what really impressed me is its performance. This RC car is not just for show; it can do some seriously cool stunts. It can drift, spin, and even climb down stairs with ease. I've even tried dropping it from a few feet higher, and it handled the impact surprisingly well.Overall, the Aiqi RC gesture sensing stunt car has been a hit for my kids. It's not only entertaining but also a great way for kids to develop their coordination skills. Plus, watching it perform its stunts is simply exhilarating.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really cool remote control car, but wrist remote is very temperamental. Thankfully it comes with a regular remote. Also nice that it doesn’t use batteries it uses a charger

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Would have loved to give it 5 stars, because it is a lot of fun... BUT
reviews.reviewText: First car I received didn't come with the battery it was supposed to have. There was no option to contact the seller, so I did an exchange.Second car I received had all parts, but the gesture controller doesn't work.I'm not replacing a 2nd time - too much hassle.That being said, the main controller does work - though a bit clunky.The car itself is great and is tons of fun. My son loved it. Pretty much everything is as advertised. It goes almost any terrain, even grass if not too tall. and can move in any direction. Fun to play and try to do tricks.Even has this cool little steam function to make it look like smoke coming out of the tail pipe.Would have been great if the gesture controller worked.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It's NOT working
reviews.reviewText: Bought this as a gift worked 20 seconds and stopped. Can't return it cuz it's past the return date, bought it as a Christmas gift. Just looking to have it replaced since I bought it hoping my grandson could use it.
